node.description: LUTs and registers in input domain for uGMT
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for positive EMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for positive EMTF and OMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for positive OMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for BMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for BMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for BMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for negative OMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for negative OMTF and EMTF inputs.
Contains sort rank LUT and phi offset register and well as error counters for negative EMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for positive EMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for positive EMTF and OMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for positive OMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for BMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for BMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for BMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for negative OMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for negative OMTF and EMTF inputs.
Contains extrapolation and calo idx bit LUTs for negative EMTF inputs.
